value: Study of Sun over Choppy Ocean

label: Description
value: Choppy sea in foreground with waves on rocks at right. In sky at center,  the sun through the clouds is reflected on the ocean.

value: Graphite on cream wove paper, bound

label: Provenance
value: Anna Richards Brewster, Scarsdale, NY, 1905-1952; William T. Brewster,

label: Credit line
value: Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest
